TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {99700=March 2, 2014 - Warm, soft and comfortable. Very nice sweatshirt. A bit pricey though., 100097=January 1, 2014 - I gifted my daughter and her family with four of these sweatshirts. They called to say they were thrilled with the sweatshirts and a friend has already looked in to order one. They have a farm and will put the warm gifts to good use. My daughter was in the Air Force., 98167=April 9, 2015 - This is my favorite hoodie because people can easily read it. I get MANY comments on it, asking what insignias are; saying they really like this; those who know what insignias are also say they really like it; I'm asked frequently where can they get this, etc. I wear things like this to make others aware of our military, our pride we should have in them & our country. This hoodie gets the point across very well. Very soft, warm, worth the money definitely., 98958=August 23, 2014 - very nice sweat shirt, 99308=July 8, 2014 - Excellent quality....like the weight. textBeforeTable: Garment Measurements: Shirt imported. Country of origin will vary by size and color Machine wash warm, tumble dry medium, do not dry clean 50% cotton / 50% polyester In recognition of their service, our hooded sweatshirt pays tribute to the brave members of each branch of our military: Army, Navy, Air Force, Marines, and Coast Guard. Made of soft cotton and screen-printed right here in the U.S.A. Democracy. Freedom. Honor. These are the ideals that make our country great, the lofty values embodied by our proud men and women in uniform. Those who serve in the U.S. military are America's finest, our heroes -- and the GreaterGood Network salutes them.
